comments.body: possibly add compose/groups for constructed vars and groups (see virtualbox for example)
Thanks, I added those. I'm also going to make another pass later and use that facility for the constructed groups we already make. Super helpful.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +89,93 @@                at https://docs.openstack.org/os-client-config/latest/user/configuration.html#config-files
            type: string
            default: None
        compose:
            description: Create vars from jinja2 expressions.
